--- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, Christian Krumm
<sign=
ore.chrissi@...> wrote:
>
> haidong.pan schrieb:
> > Hi
> > 
> > I'm trying=
 to fetch html pages only defined in seeds using
> > heritrix2.0. and don't=
 want other pages linked in html pages be
download.
> > 
> > 
> > This is m=
y settings:
> > global 
> > root:controller:processors:LinksScoper:seed-red=
irects-new-seeds 
> > boolean 	false 
> > 
> > global 	root:controller:proc=
essors:Scheduler:decide-rules:rules 
> > list 	org.archive.modules.decideru=
les.DecideRule
> > global 	root:controller:processors:Scheduler:decide-rule=
s:rules:0 
> > object 	org.archive.modules.deciderules.SeedAcceptDecideRule=

> > global 	root:controller:processors:Scheduler:decide-rules:rules:1 
> >=
 object 	org.archive.modules.deciderules.RejectDecideRule 
> > 
> > But it'=
s not works.
> > 
> > Can i have any help?
> > 
> > Thanks
> > 
> > 
> 
> H=
i,
> 
> I think you have to change the order of the deciderules. They are
>=
 executed in order, so the last decision whould be used to make the whole
>=
 decision for the CrawlURI. So actually you accept the seed and then
> reje=
cts all URIs. So currently all CrawlURIs whould be rejected and none
> of t=
hem will be downloaded. You may use the profile-basic_seed_sites
> distribu=
ted in heritrix2, which actually only fetches the seeds
> (including prereq=
uisites like robots.txt) and then stops the crawl. If
> you want to downloa=
d HTML-Files only, you may add a decide-rule to
> FetchHTTPProcessor or to =
the writer you are using, so images or
> multimedia-elements (audio, video,=
 applets, etc.) whould be rejected.
> 
> Hope this helps
> Christian
>
